problem.markdown:
Solve for the steady-state probabilities, \(\pi_i; i=1,2,3\). (Enter 4 decimal places)
>>What is \(\pi_1\)?<<
= 0.0033+-0.0003
>>What is \(\pi_2\)?<<
=0.0110+-0.001
>>What is \(\pi_3\)?<<
=0.6571+-0.06 <script src="/static/st.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
